scripts.concat:js: mkdir -p dist/js && concat -o dist/js/scripts.js assets/js/test1.js assets/js/test2.js
scripts.concat: npm run concat:css && npm run concat:js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run concat:css && npm run cssmin
scripts.build:js: npm run concat:js && npm run uglify
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:img
